name: Dijital Djinni
description:
CLICK + DRAG 

just a little upload of an AR element I made mid 2018. used Zbrush(Sculpt)  & Maya (for retopology, rig+animation) Unity (with shader forge + vuforia) and Photoshop (for textures). 

the non-spatial “djinn” of islamic cosmology are made of smokeless flame & hidden from our realm. By superstition, they are associated with paranormal and electrical phenomena; some interpretations of 'smokeless flame' even identify the substance as electricity.
__
both temporal space and transmission/reception of the immaterial (digital) is expanded immeasurably by prosthesis of electronic technologies; a transdimensional reach is afforded.
